Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the situation by stating that the enslavement of Arabs is being celebrated in America, when in fact, the video is from an anti-Trump protest in London.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the enslavement of Arabs is being celebrated in America.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video of an anti-Trump protest in London represents a celebration of the enslavement of Arabs in America, which is a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the video is from an anti-Trump protest in London and does not depict the celebration of the enslavement of Arabs in America.
